text: The Women's 4 × 200 metre freestyle relay competition of the 2018 FINA World Swimming Championships (25 m) was held on 15 December 2018. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! !!
